FuncDef:
The dot1x max-user command configures the maximum number of access users allowed on an 802.1X authentication-enabled interface.
The undo dot1x max-user command restores the default configuration.
By default, a maximum of 64 users are allowed to access an 802.1X authentication-enabled interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of access users on an 802.1X authentication-enabled interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1024.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the maximum number of access users allowed on an 801.X authentication-enabled interface, run the dot1x max-user command.
Prerequisites
802.1X authentication has been enabled on the interface using the dot1x enable command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
